content: Black's move surrounds the white stone by occupying its last liberty. The white stone is thus captured and will be removed from the board.
translations: ita:La mossa del Nero occupa l'ultima libertà della pietra bianca, circondandola. Viene così catturata e sarà rimossa dal ta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
